alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:47AM CDT until June 10 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rush County in central Kansas... Southwestern Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1247 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yocemento, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Hays, Catherine, Toulon, Munjor, Victoria and Pfeifer. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
